name: @vscode/sync-api-client
description: A client that calls VS Code API from a non extension host worker in sync fashion.

scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.all:publish: git clean -xfd . && npm install && npm run compile:publish && npm run lint
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo "⛔ Can only publish from a secure pipeline ⛔" && node ../build/npm/fail
